title: TOWIE's Amber Turner dons sexy mini dress to undergo state-of-the-art facial
text:
They both soared to fame in a flurry of glitz and glamour on TOWIE.

So it is little wonder Amber Turner and Amy Childs were putting on a stunning display on Friday as they attended a pamper day in Essex with leading brands such as Forever sewing, HB London, Dr Mark Buddha, 3D Hydro2 facial and 3D lipo.

The current TV star, 26, looked stunning in a sexy jumper dress with boots while TOWIE original Amy, 29, made a bold statement in a red top and jeans.

Wow! Amber Turner joined a host of TOWIE stars in getting glammed up at a pamper day in Essex with leading brands such as Forever sewing, HB London, Dr Mark Buddha, 3D Hydro2 facial and 3D lipo

Amber, who is dating her co-star Dan Edgar, looked stunning as she proved herself to have few inhibitions by undergoing work on a table in the middle of the room.

Former beautician Amy was no doubt applying her expert information by chatting to the doctors about the treatments on offer.

Another TOWIE star came in Danielle Armstrong who was super casual in a puffa jacket and leggings while posing up a storm.

Frankie Essex looked glamorous in a cape and poloneck with tight trousers and an elegant Chanel handbag to give a designer touch.

In depth: Amy Childs, 29, was also in attendance where she was chatting in depth about the treatments

All white: Amber looked stunning as she proved herself to have few inhibitions by undergoing work on a table in the middle of the room

Last week, Amber spoke of the pressure of having her romance cast in the spotlight, admitting 'everyone is waiting for Dan to mess up' in an interview with MailOnline.

The couple have endured a tumultuous romance, with Dan pursuing Clelia Theodorou and (earlier this year) Chloe Sims during breaks in their relationship.

The pair last had an argument in Marbella, with the blonde beauty sobbing to Chloe Meadows that she felt all of his friends 'hated her' when he went out partying and ignored her.

Oops! Amy seemed to have suffered a wardrobe malfunction due to a large wet patch on her leg

Check me out: Another TOWIE star came in Danielle Armstrong who was super casual in a puffa jacket and leggings while posing up a storm

Now back home, she told MailOnline: 'We're completely fine. All couples have their rows. 'Obviously we have been through so much, people judge it and they’re like "break-up with him”. They’re waiting for Dan to mess up.

'When couples get back together in the normal world nobody knows about the arguments they have behind closed doors. But because it’s on TV everyone judges you way more.'

Amber has been open about her insecurities in the relationship and admits their recent reunion caused frosty opinions from some of his friends- particularly during filming.

Chic: Frankie Essex looked glamorous in a cape and poloneck with tight trousers and an elegant Chanel handbag to give a designer touch

Tough: Last week, Amber spoke of the pressure of having her romance cast in the spotlight, admitting 'everyone is waiting for Dan to mess up' in an interview with MailOnline

That was then... Love Island star Chloe Crowhust glammed up for the bash

Now, however, it appears some of his friends have backtracked after seeing how distraught she was when she felt like they had a vendetta against her on TOWIE.

'Diags has apologised. He just makes jokes, sometimes when they’re not appropriate,' Amber said.

'He said "look I know I’ve never said it before, but I am happy that you are together and I want you guys to work out. I wish you all the best."

'It was nice to hear him say that because I do spend a lot of time with Diags. He is always around Dan’s, we spend a lot of time together when the cameras aren’t on.'
